mapper.select: SELECT mentoring_apply_code, mentoring_notice_code, mentoring_notice_detail_code, member_id, amount, amount_status, update_YMD FROM mentoring_apply ORDER BY update_YMD DESC LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset};
/* 질문에 해당하는 답변 코드 조회 */ SELECT mentoring_notice_question_answer_code FROM mentoring_notice_question_answer WHERE mentoring_notice_question_code=#{questionCode};

/* 공고목록조회 */ SELECT member_id AS memberId, mentoring_notice_code AS noticeCode, mentoring_notice_title AS noticeTitle, mentoring_mentor_PSBLTY_start_YMD AS noticeStartYmd, mentoring_mentor_PSBLTY_end_YMD AS noticeEndYmd, mentor_notice_REG_YMD AS noticeRegYmd FROM mentoring_notice ORDER BY mentor_notice_REG_YMD DESC LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset};

/* 멘토링공고 질문 조회 */ SELECT mentoring_notice_question_code, mentoring_notice_code, member_id, question_content, question_writing_YMD FROM mentoring_notice_question ORDER BY question_writing_YMD DESC LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset};

/* 멘토링공고 답변 조회 */ SELECT mentoring_notice_question_answer_code, mentoring_notice_question_code, mentor_id, answer_content, answer_writing_YMD FROM mentoring_notice_question_answer ORDER BY answer_writing_YMD DESC LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset};
